content.title: Worry
content.subtitle: What's Killing Me
content.description: Worry is the default mode of the human heart because we don't believe that God is in control. We worry because we try to secure the future. In this sermon we will learn to turn our worry into prayer, to renew our minds with the truth that God is in control.
